description: Conservation Area Consent in connection with demolition of light industrial building (B1 Use Class). Full Planning application P111702 also submitted. This application may affect the character and appearance of the Conservation Area.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions: The proposed demolition of light industrial building (B1 Use Class) is considered to be unacceptable as it would have a detrimental impact on the character and appearance of the conservation area. It does not comply with policy CS9 (Protecting and Enhancing Islingtonâ€™s Built and Historic Environment) of the Core Strategy; policies D3 (Site Planning) and D4 (Designing in context) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan (2002); and the objectives of the Islington Urban Design Guide (2006) and Conservation Area Guidance notes.
